attributes.action: give Free Radio Licences to RNLI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that a charitable organisation such as the RNLI which is run by volunteers should not have to pay up to £100,000 for radio licences. The donations should go directly to equipment, people and training to enable the charity to continue saving lives.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:  
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/RNLI-RF-licences/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
